file_insights.changes: Added import for DocumentLibraryPage component and added new route for documents under the protected dashboard layout
file_insights.impact: Enables routing to the document library page, making it accessible via /documents path

file_insights.changes: Imported DescriptionIcon from Material-UI icons and added Documents navigation item to projectNavItems array
file_insights.impact: Adds Documents navigation link to sidebar, providing user access to document library feature

patterns_discovered.description: All project-related routes (contacts, inspections, rfis, documents) follow the same pattern: import component, add Route element with path and element props
Navigation items in sidebar are kept in sync with routes in App.tsx, maintaining UI/routing consistency
Each navigation item uses a corresponding Material-UI icon that semantically represents the feature (DescriptionIcon for Documents)
All new routes are added within the ProtectedRoute wrapper, ensuring authentication is enforced for document access

gotchas_discovered.description: Adding a new navigation item requires importing the appropriate Material-UI icon separately - this could be easily missed if only modifying the navItems array
The DocumentLibraryPage component must exist and be properly exported for the import in App.tsx to work without errors

discoveries.approach_outcome: SUCCESS - Task completed as specified. Both files were modified appropriately: the new Documents route was added to App.tsx with proper imports, and sidebar navigation was updated with the corresponding navigation item and icon. The implementation follows established patterns in the codebase for consistency.

recommendations.rationale: While the imports and routes are in place, the actual DocumentLibraryPage component should be verified to ensure no build errors occur
Maintain alphabetical or logical grouping of routes (documents currently appears after rfis) for easier maintenance
Verify the sidebar link successfully navigates to the documents page and that the protected route authentication works correctly
Ensure DocumentLibraryPage includes appropriate page title/heading to help users understand their location in the app
